name: TV Show Hub
description: Curated sources specializing in episodic television series, web shows, and serial content (including rapid release trackers). Bundles IPTV extensions too
author: Kiyomi TV Curators

providers.name: The Pirate Bay
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General index offering a massive archive of long-running and older TV series.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.

providers.name: LimeTorrents
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Reliable public indexer; known for its fast indexing of new TV episode releases.
providers.cautionReason: Unverified public indexer. Contains potentially harmful/mislabelled torrents.

providers.name: TorrentDownload
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Public indexer providing quick torrents for new TV shows & serial releases.

providers.name: BitSearch.to
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Meta-search engine useful for tracking down TV episode files across diverse, international indexers.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious or misleading torrents.

providers.name: Snowfl
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General meta-search engine providing results from multiple sources; excellent for checking wide availability of TV episodes.
providers.cautionReason: External meta-search results can be unverified.

providers.name: Nyaa
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Essential source for Anime series, Japanese dramas, and other Eastern Asian TV content.

providers.name: Anime Tosho
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Automated service mirroring major episodic anime releases; provides structured Torznab data.

providers.name: TokyoTosho
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General Eastern media index, including Anime, Manga, and non-video media.
providers.cautionReason: Non-video content (e.g., games, software, archives) may contain malware.

providers.name: BTDigg
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Global DHT search engine; useful for locating *complete archives* or rare seasons of older TV series.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.

providers.name: CloudTorrents
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Modern API-based indexer offering structured, fast search results, excellent for TV show tracking.

providers.name: FileMood
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General indexer specializing in file search, useful for finding older or less common TV series archives.

providers.name: UIndex
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General tracker useful for finding international and niche TV series releases.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.

providers.name: IPTV Org
providers.description: Large open-source IPTV playlist featuring legal TV channels worldwide.

providers.name: Samsung TV Plus Channels
providers.description: Samsung TV Plus: Free ad-supported live news, movies, and entertainment.

providers.name: Fire TV Channels
providers.description: Amazon Fire TV free live channels lineup.

providers.name: Free-TV
providers.description: Community-maintained global free-to-air TV channels.

providers.name: Xumo
providers.description: Xumo free streaming: news, sports, movies, and lifestyle.

providers.name: Local Now
providers.description: Regional news, weather updates, and community programming.

providers.name: LG Channels
providers.description: LG Channels Watch Free ad-supported TV content.

providers.name: NZAU KODI TV
providers.description: KODI-optimized TV playlist for NZ & AU Freeview.

providers.name: Xiaomi Channels
providers.description: Xiaomi and Mi TV free international and lifestyle programming.

providers.name: Distro TV
providers.description: DistroTV: free movies, TV shows, and live entertainment.

providers.name: Redbox TV
providers.description: Redbox live TV: free movies, news, and pop-culture.

providers.name: Vizio TV
providers.description: Vizio WatchFree ad-supported live TV and on-demand.

providers.name: Tablo TV
providers.description: Tablo TV streaming channels: free over-the-air style content.

providers.name: Roku Channels
providers.description: Roku Channel lineup: live TV, movies, and curated streams.

providers.name: Worldwide Webcams
providers.description: Live webcam streams from landmarks and nature spots worldwide.

providers.name: logan-xall
providers.description: Diverse IPTV playlist with international TV categories.

providers.name: Adult IPTV
providers.description: Explicit content intended for mature audiences only.
